amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the Office of Inspector General under the General Services Administration by $6 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funding for the General Activites under the General Services Administration by $8 million and increase funding for the Office of Inspector General under the General Services Administration by $6 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cardoza amendment (A004) Agreed to by recorded vote: 281 - 144 (Roll no. 584).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Cardoza.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Cardoza amendment (A004) Agreed to by recorded vote: 281 - 144 (Roll no. 584).
